thread.title: Photos: Police, firefighters face off in Guns & Hoses Softball Classic
thread.title_full: Photos: Police, firefighters face off in Guns & Hoses Softball Classic

title: Photos: Police, firefighters face off in Guns & Hoses Softball Classic
text: Photos: Police, firefighters face off in Guns & Hoses Softball Classic Matt Hinshaw/The Daily Courier Matt Hinshaw/The Daily Courier Prescott Fire Marshal Don Devendorf, top photo, pitches Saturday afternoon during the Guns & Hoses Softball Classic against the Prescott Police Department at Ken Lindley Field in downtown Prescott. Below, Prescott Police Lt. Jon Brambila drives a ball into the outfield. Benefits from the game and raffle went to Champions for Children Foundation's after-school scholarship program.
